name: XeoDev
tagline: Innovative ideas that have yet to be discovered
description:
Startup and Growth Phase Technology Partnercoaching . coding . clarity
XeoDev is a full service web, apps & software development agency. several of our clients are in the start up or next stage of growth.We look for long term partnerships where we can continue to accrue technical value over time. If we can be of service to your organization by providing online assets including: websites, mobile applications, social media presence, process improvement, or startup engagement.We partner with business leaders to deploy unique disruptive solutions.
Our favorite clients are experts in their field looking to disrupt that field with new technology. We partner as experts in technology and are able to build a wide variety of web and mobile app functionality in a short time. together we can accomplish anything.
We bring decades of industry experience to your next project, we are entrepreneurs who understand your business model.Partnering to bring disruptive ideas to market on time.
